metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2208 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
tpp 1.3.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a--exec command in a TPP template file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tpp - 1.3.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tpp package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-3').
